name: Afro Run
description:
An unexpectedly fun and addictive game!

▼ ▽ How to play? ▽ ▼

Swipe to move your player towards the goal while avoiding obstacles on the way.

If your Afro gets cut by the saw, its volume will be reduced.
The same thing happens if your player has to go through the lava floor.

Luckily, you can gain back the Afro's volume by collecting any Afro you see on your way.

With the help of the Magnet item, you can attract the afros more quickly.

Try to get as many gems as you can. You can use these gems for the following purposes:
Unlock your favorite skin
Increase the valuable time of the magnet.
Extend the Bonus Area
Do not go out of the rails and fall out of your running course.
There'll be a lot of stages with various kinds of gimmicks for you to challenges.

Now, let's goal and have fun!
